field.label: Domain
field.help: Select a wildcard domain for this subdomain.

field.label: Subdomain
field.help: Enter a subdomain. For example, opn.example.com if the wildcard domain is *.example.com.

field.label: Port
field.help: Leave empty to use ports 80 and 443 with automatic redirection from HTTP to HTTPS or choose a custom port. Don't forget to allow these ports with a Firewall rule.

field.label: Dynamic DNS
field.help: Enable or disable Dynamic DNS. Requires a DNS Provider in General Settings. The DNS records of this subdomain will be automatically updated.

field.label: HTTP-01 Challenge Redirection
field.help: Enter a domain name or IP address. The HTTP-01 challenge will be redirected to that destination. This enables an ACME Client behind Caddy to serve "/.well-known/acme-challenge/" on port 80. Caddy will reverse proxy the HTTP-01 challenge for this subdomain.

field.label: Access List
field.help: Select an Access List to restrict access to this subdomain. If unset, any local or remote client is allowed access.

field.label: Basic Auth
field.help: Select Users to restrict access to this subdomain. Basic Auth matches after Access Lists. If unset, any user is allowed access.
